body_html: @martinwicke I tried extending the Exporter class but I can only use it to export the model to the SavedModel format which I cannot use to restore and continue training. Am I missing something? I also do not have access to the Estimator session so I can not use a Saver.
body_text: @martinwicke I tried extending the Exporter class but I can only use it to export the model to the SavedModel format which I cannot use to restore and continue training. Am I missing something? I also do not have access to the Estimator session so I can not use a Saver.
body: @martinwicke I tried extending the Exporter class but I can only use it to export the model to the SavedModel format which I cannot use to restore and continue training. Am I missing something? I also do not have access to the Estimator session so I can not use a Saver.
